downloadTitle: Scalable Security Modeling with Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013
downloadDescription: This paper describes how security modeling features in Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 for authorization work at scale, the implications associated with these features functioning at high volumes, and guidance on common and recommended usage patterns for modeling Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 security at scale, incorporating teams as appropriate.

detailsSection:
Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 offers a wide range of security modeling features, and it is important to choose the most appropriate approach to implementing a particular solution. Each feature offers a combination of characteristics that provides a balance between granularity of access control, administrative ease, and impact on scalability. Having an understanding of the underlying mechanisms supporting each security modeling feature can be useful when selecting the best approach to solving a particular challenge, especially when planning to develop a large volume system.

This paper describes how the security modeling features in Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 for authorization work at scale, the implications associated with these features functioning at high volumes, and guidance on common and recommended usage patterns for modeling Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 security at scale, incorporating teams as appropriate.
